name: psychic-surge
effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
